effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 574,647 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 244,531.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 3,786 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
